description:
In this course, you will learn to work with the local routers of the sites and also routers that will control redirects of the pages in client machines. These routes work together with Angularjs.

You will see how to create beautiful layouts only by modifying the routes by which you show the contents of the website with the ease of working with multiple views, you will see everything in practice and with examples, without losing time on other things.

The following UI Router content will be covered in this course:

  • Creating routers
  • Processing undesired routes
  • Working with URL parameters
  • How to catch events
  • Working with pages transitions
  • And many more topics

We will make all resources used in the project and the project itself, available to download. You can download the project of the class and make improvements and experiment with the codes.
title: Angular UI Router
